GSEA KEGG

Source: R/enrichment_analysis.R
gsea_kegg.Rd

Perform GSEA using KEGG pathways.

Usage

gsea_kegg(
  geneList,
  organism,
  keyType = "kegg",
  pAdjustMethod = "BH",
  pvalueCutoff = 0.05,
  minGSSize = 10,
  maxGSSize = 500
)

Arguments

geneList

Named numeric vector of gene-level statistics (e.g., log2FC), names are gene IDs.

organism

KEGG organism code.

keyType

Type of gene ID (default: "kegg").

pAdjustMethod

Method for p-value adjustment (default: "BH").

pvalueCutoff

Numeric; p-value cutoff.

minGSSize

Integer; minimum gene set size.

maxGSSize

Integer; maximum gene set size.

Value

A gseaResult object.
